title: Champion Reveal: Tahm Kench, the River King

replies.body: Lets all welcome Yoshi into the League
w so troll
may i ask... How is it a Troll?

I eat everyone, spit u on the enemy side, flash + ghost
'Bye adc'
but you can choose when you leave.. so if you saw him going in you would just get out ..
i don't think the enemy gets the choice to leave

i Believe he is referring to allies not the enemy because in bronze you will get that player who can some how throw you off the map or throw you at the enemy tower

"i don't think the enemy gets the choice to leave"

He is referring to allies not the enemy cause you know i'm bronze gonna eat you and flash into enemy tower throw you off the map (cause only bronze can do that) or throw you at the tower then you die(cause im not bronze 5 i can't throw you off the map somehow)
Lol, eat someone and teleport to fountain turret

what about that team comp

The enemy should just drop out of his stomach where kalista ulted Tahm Kench and if it isn't it surely will be by next patch
If Tahm eats Gangplank and then Gangplank eats oranges would he still get out?

Just thinking, would {{item:3222}} be able to cleanse the slow from eating an enemy?

Also, imagine a bard on this guy's team and he grabbed Zhonya's. Eat someone, wait till the end of the duration, zhonya, then bard ult, equals a very useless ADC.
LOL, i found something you can do thats better then what u all said. EAT DRAGON AND BARON... WAIT THERES MORE FLASH W ENEMY THEN ULT TO FOUNTAIN. NO ESCAPE FKER, GG WE ALL WIN.

You wouldn't be able to eat the Dragon or Baron, since both are immune to all types of CC (Bard ult isn't cc if you guys were wondering). Also, I think it would be impossible to eat someone then ult to base due to the Ults lengthy cast time. They would escape before the fish dived.

“Now that meal? It left me satisfied. So cry if you want boy, ‘cause you had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool, the fool who let me in."
 :D {{summoner:31}}
such a troll ( swallowing people ) but he does look really fun

The reason W is a Troll is you can swallow anyone including your own team mates , its not bad that you can save them from enemy teams but if to say I was raging at you and I was playing this new champion Id keep on using my W on you pissing you off every time I have a shot and that's one example... there are more good and bad examples.
Hmm... Tahm Kench bound to a {{champion:429}} with {{summoner:12}} possibly means you can have a 3 man backdoor.

his passive, his e passive, and his ult passive

Hi
{{champion:432}}

I have seen a lot of complaints so far about this champ, he seems like a tanky champ that can carry his allies to safety if required and if comunucated correctly into battle, imagion your low on health and he swallows you and gets you to saftey considring he gets a speed boost. Or a tank diving into battle and have an adc flop out and DESTROY THE ENEMY.

Oh lord what has happened to Kirby?

On another note, does his W act as Zhonyas? (Provided Tahm doesn't die)
Lissandra R, Zhonyas, Bard, Bard no.2, Tahm = 2.5 + 2.5 + 2.5 +2.5 +2.5 + 6 = 18.5s of invulnerablility.
Not that you would ever need it.
